name: Solitaire :)
description:
Infinite Solitaire: The classic card game we all know and love but with a new modern and minimalistic design.

• Therapy: Solitaire is a refreshing mental escape that acts as a good stress-reliever.
• Essentials: Solitaire is an essential game that is a must have on your phone.
• Anytime: Solitaire is always at the ready – play anytime to escape boredom.
• Mental Sharpness: Solitaire helps maintain your mentally sharpness.

Features:
-undo
-hints
-tap to move
-standard scoring
-vegas scoring
-draw 1 or draw 3
-left handed mode
-cumulative scoring
-leaderboards
-lifetime statistics

-change face colors
-change back colors
-change back design
-change background colors
-change background design
-custom background image

-sound effects
-haptic feedback
